author: dims
msg: - In a previous patch I submitted, a bug was inadvertently issued. Removing existing headers using SOAPHeaderElement.extractHeaderElements(String) does not do what I intended to do. Here is a fix patch (and a test that checks that).

- WS-Addressing handler while processing reply messages, do not set a 'To' header if no Reply-To was specified in the incoming message. This is a violation of the spec since To header elements are mandatory in WS-Addressing messages. The patch fixes this.

author: dims
msg: Fix from "Jarek Gawor" for "use msgContext instead of msgContext.getCurrentContext()"

author: dims
msg: fixes NPE errors in AddressingHandler when a request does not contain any or some WS-Addressing headers.
